alert.note: Alert for Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 2:44PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Harney and west central Malheur Counties through 345 PM PDT... At 243 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dunnean, or 44 miles east of Burns, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Riverside around 410 PM MDT. Mosquito Mountain around 420 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
